title: Did FloraSpring Help a 65-Year-Old Man ‘Poop Out 42 Pounds’?
subtitle: Online advertisements for the FloraSpring weight loss supplement led users to pictures and video of Dr. Steven Masley, and mentions of a "pooping habit."
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A picture shows a 65-year-old man who had 42 pounds worth of bowel movements after using the FloraSpring weight loss supplement.
